title: Wheels on the Bus
author: Author not listed
l: The wheels on the bus go round and round
Round and round, round and round
The wheels on the bus go round and round

br.l: The people on the bus go [nose blowing sound x3]
[nose blowing sound x3] [nose blowing sound x3]
The people on the bus go [nose blowing sound x3]
The kids on the bus go YAY YAY YAYYY!!
YAY YAY YAYYY!! YAY YAY YAY!!
The kids on the bus go YAY YAY YAYYY!!
The chickens on the bus go bawk bawk bawk
Bawk bawk bawk, bawk bawk bawk
The chickens on the bus go bawk bawk bawk
The flowers on the bus go [silence]
The flowers on the bus go [silence]
The moral of the story: You will meet many types of people on the bus, so it's important not to judge based on things one cannot change.
